sentences: Kõrgeausus on oluline omadus heas inimeses.
Ta on tuntud oma kõrgeause poolest.
context: Kõrgeausus is an Estonian noun that refers to a state or quality of having high moral character, noble principles, and elevated ethical standards. It combines 'kõrge' (high) with 'ausus' (honesty/nobility), suggesting someone who possesses both integrity and a dignified, honorable nature.
